__e: So, how did a murdered detective become the star of their show?
A man, a statesman, he is to be killed, assassinated, in London.
And you're telling me he was murdered aboard my ship?
Do you forget that the man who murdered my father lies across the valley floor?
Your best friend murdered my father.
These are the same men who murdered my father.
- I murdered my brother, And my mother, And my two sisters.
Since I've been inside, my son was murdered and my wife may have been, both as a result of things I did in here.
I murdered my son, 'cause I believed in my heart that it was the right thing to do.
I murdered my own son. For nothing.
And now, you have murdered the son of the god of gods... and you are doomed.
Look, if I thought for one moment that I murdered my friend, I would have pled guilty that night.
Come with me, I'll show you what he did... after he murdered his wife.
What kept me going, What really kept me up at night thinking... Was finding the bastard who murdered our family...
Your husband's boss was murdered last night.
He might have had a drink with one person and been murdered by another.
But when I got there, he was already dead, murdered by that old man.
They will do it in her name and in the name of her father, who was also assassinated by a hum...
How do you know if someone was murdered and not just died?
I want to know why my boss has a file on my murdered father and didn't tell me.
But he was murdered. And you know who did it, don't you?
